head.title: FOSTER WHEELER TO CUT 500 JOBS AFTER COMPLETING DEAL

hedline.hl1: FOSTER WHEELER TO CUT 500 JOBS AFTER COMPLETING DEAL

block.p: The Foster Wheeler Corporation, an engineering and construction company, said yesterday that it would cut 500 jobs and take a pretax charge of $46 million against earnings after completing the acquisition of Ahlstrom Pyropower Sector, a maker of boilers and electric power stations. Foster Wheeler, based in Clinton, N.J., announced in September that it would acquire Ahlstrom Pyropower, a unit of the A. Ahlstrom Corporation, a privately held Finnish industrial company, for $200 million.
